title: Weeding Made Easy - Year Round Mulch Garden

tasks.task: Apply mulch to control weeds in a year-round garden.
subtasks: Locate hay in another part of the garden.
Lift and carry hay to the weedy area.
Spread hay over the weeds to smother them.

tasks.task: Monitor and maintain weeds in the garden.
subtasks: Identify weeds growing through the mulch.
Remove excess hay to prevent suffocating desirable plants.
